3 Getting started 3.1 Installing packages If you have installed related packages already, you can jump to the next step. #install.packages("data.table") #install.packages("dtplyr") 3.2 Loading packages Load the packages for todays seminar. #load the packages for this seminar library(data.table) library(dtplyr) Note: Once you have loaded the package successfully, there will be a check mark display before the package under your packages tab at the bottom right pane. 3.3 Dataset
